entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 1400 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy. Snow level 1400 metres. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
